name: Boom Goons
description:
This is a prototype of bomb battle arena game of using bombs to defeat your opponent.  There is 1-2 player story mode level and a  2 player arena mode available at the moment, I'm planning on adding more levels and features in the near future.

Player 1 Controls:  Arrow Keys to Move and Right Shift key to place Bombs

Player 2 Controls:  WASD keys to Move and Left Shift key to place Bombs
